description: This file defines a React component for a Jira Projects page. It allows users to search and create Jira projects via API calls, managing user inputs, loading states, and displaying results or errors.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search for Jira projects using the invokeTool API, updates the result or error state.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new Jira project via invokeTool API, updates the result or error state.
